players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana; she is mafia. Charlie was killed by her. Vote her out."
Bob: "Alice, you claim to be detective but didn't investigate Charlie. And you say you killed him—only mafia can kill. That raises doubts about your claim. Vote her out."
Diana: "Bob, Alice didn't investigate Charlie. If she were the detective she would have. So she either didn't investigate him or is lying. That makes her claim about me suspect. Vote her."
You: "I didn't investigate Charlie because I already knew she killed him. I know she's mafia. Vote her out. Bob, your doubts are unwarranted."
Bob: "Alice, you say you killed Charlie. Only mafia can kill. So you must be mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "Bob, your doubts are unwarranted. Alice is lying. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
